about_the_game:
Step into the world of Afallon with this demo, an early alpha experience that I’ve been working hard on as a solo developer. The demo takes place in the eerie and mysterious Coalway Swamp, a small but vibrant region of Afallon.

You’ll have the chance to play as one of three classes:

  • Necromancer: Master the dark arts and command the undead.

  • Shieldmaster: A defensive powerhouse capable of withstanding fierce assaults.

  • Wizard: Wield arcane magic to devastate your enemies.

The demo offers a glimpse into what the full game will become, featuring:

  • Around 300 items.

  • Interior locations to explore and uncover secrets.

  • Four quest chains, with a total of 24 quests to complete.

  • Three Challenge Stones, presenting unique tests of skill.

  • A dungeon packed with danger, including three tough boss fights.

This demo is very much a work in progress, with most of the core features and content in place but still requiring refinement and tuning. I’d love to hear your feedback, especially on bugs and suggestions for new content. Your input will be invaluable in shaping Afallon into the best game it can be.

Thank you for joining me on this journey. Your support means everything!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: i5 8600 or Ryzen 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: @1080p 60fps low. System Requirements might change in the future
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: i5 10500 or Ryzen 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: @1440p 60fps ultra. System Requirements might change in the future

short_description: Explore the mysterious Coalway Swamp in Afallon, an early alpha demo. Choose from three unique classes, Necromancer, Shieldmaster, or Wizard. The demo features 24 quests, 300+ items, interior locations, three Challenge Stones, and a dungeon with three bosses.
